Antonio de Clavijo |named_for = Llacta Cunani |seat_type = |seat = |parts_type = Parishes |parts_style = coll |parts = Urban Parishes |p1 = La Matriz |p2 = Eloy ALfaro |p3 = Ignacio Flores |p4 = San Buenaventura |p5 = Juan Montalvo |p6 = Gil Ramírez Dávalos |p7 = Hermano Miguel |leader_title = Mayor |leader_name = Byron Cárdenas Cerda |elevation_m = 2800 |area_total_km2 = 264.86 |area_metro_km2 = 1385.64 |population_as_of = 2010 |population_footnotes = INEC decadal national census |population_total = 98355 |population_density_km2 = auto |population_metro = 298440 (Great Latacunga) |population_demonym = Latacungueño / a |timezone = ECT |utc_offset = -5 |coordinates = | postal_code_type = ZIP codes | postal_code = |area_code = (+593) 3 |website = Official website |footnotes = }} Latacunga (; Quechua: Latakunga) is a plateau town of Ecuador, capital of the Cotopaxi Province, south of Quito. At the time of census 2010 Latacunga had 98,355 people living here.www.inec.gob.ec ==References== Category:Cities in Ecuador Category:Cotopaxi Province Category:Capitals of Ecuadorian provinces
title: Latacunga
